attributes.additional_details:
Following the world wide recession the UK has suffered many cuts which are potentially wrecking our country.
We have all been told time and again we must pull in our belts to cope with these very harsh cut backs.
Redundancy, lack of jobs available and no prospects of a secure future are all due to lack of funding.
Yet the UK is still giving millions away on Aid overseas.
It is now the time to say enough is enough and to
think of our country first!
We are a very small Island and cannot continue to be so soft in giving millions overseas when all that happens is the money is waisted in red tape or corruption.
Bob Geldof tried this in the 1980s and yet today we see the exact same thing happening with no improvements at all.
Stop all overseas aid until our country is able to look after our own people.
